titles.title: To require the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a study on national forest volunteers, and for other purposes.
To require the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a study on national forest volunteers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
This bill directs the Forest Service to report on, with respect to each National Forest
the amount of volunteer hours served, the deferred maintenance backlog, whether volunteers could carry out any projects under the deferred maintenance backlog, and any barriers to increasing volunteer participation.
